Detailed Description

The TTSymbol class is used to represent a string and efficiently pass and compare that string. At the moment the implementation is somewhat crude and really slow and it should be improved in the future.

This current implementation has an internal table that is implemented as a fixed array. Each symbol is identified by its index in this array.

Member Function Documentation

const TTSymbol * TTSymbol::lookup ( const TTString  string  )  [static]

Look in the symbol table for this string. If it exists then return its id. If it does not exist then it is created, added to the symbol table and this new symbol's id is returned.
